game.name: Adam and Eve 5 Part 1
game.description:
The fifth version of Adam and Eve has come back with more fun and thrill combined with a package of more challenging puzzles. We are pretty sure that you will definitely give them a try if you have tried out its all previous popular versions. You should also try it out if you are a newbie to this version. Join Adam and Eve 5: Part 1 and get ready to be a part of the biggest adventure of Adam and Eve! This version comes with a new twist. The problem is that Adam has left his previous love and seeks for a new soul mate. 
Are you ready to help him out? Give this cool adventure in the fun Adam and Eve series a try and provide your assistance to complete multiple unique challenges to persevere and spot his love! Keep solving puzzles and helping Adam to move forward while interacting with different kinds of objects wisely in each level! In the advanced levels, challenges will be bigger than ever before. It will be your job to get the puzzle solved and make him closer to your true love. 
This funny puzzle games for kids is created on the prehistoric theme and includes multiple scenes with a different challenge. Your favorite Adam will definitely be highly thankful to you if his true love is found by you once again. Enjoy the fifth episode of Adam and Eve series on PCs, android phones, iPhones and gaming consoles! Seek more fun and pleasure on our exclusive range of free adventure games where no download required playing your favorite game!
